long_description: If you could carry only one pot on your next technical adventure this would be purist's choice. Designed for maximum heating efficiency, rounded bottom edges offer more surface area to the flame. A dripless spout controls the flow and the tight fitting lid won't come loose halfway through the pour. Folding wire handles fold flush to minimize space in the pack.
short_description: If you could carry only one pot on your next technical adventure this would be purist's choice.
